name: The way to Us
description:
Rocky the cat and Eleanor have been separated, help them find their way to each other.

Specificities

Eleanor and Rocky can push objects such as boxes and keys.
When a box is pushed, all boxes of the same colour are pushed in the same direction.
Keys pushed on doors of the same colour opens them.

Controls
  • Move Eleanor with arrow keys
  • Move Rocky with wasd
  • Press 'r' to restart a level
Level Editor
  • Left mouse click to place a tile
  • Right mouse click to remove a tile
  • Middle mouse click pushed to travel in the level
  • Scroll mouse wheel to zoom in/out
